sentences.sContent: Employees look to you to show them the behaviors that they should emulate.
sentences.sContent_eng: Employees look to you to show them the behaviors that they should emulate.
sentences.sCn: 员工希望你为他们表现出他们应当模仿的行为举止。

sentences.sContent: "I do not want my fans to ever emulate that or be that way," says the singer. "I don't want my fans to think they have to be that way to be great.
sentences.sContent_eng: "I do not want my fans to ever emulate that or be that way," says the singer. "I don't want my fans to think they have to be that way to be great.
sentences.sCn: 我并不希望歌迷效仿我的做法，也不想让他们误以为要成功就必须得这样，那是以前的事了，在我的低潮期，而且也导致了一系列灾难。

synos.tran: 仿真；模仿；尽力赶上；同…竞争
